buttons.name: STATE GOV. SERVICES
buttons.primary_use: Access all State Government Services via the UMANG portal, including health, education, travel, and more.

content.title: Click the "Services" Tab
content.description: Look for the main navigation bar, usually located at the top of the page. You will see options like Home, Services, Schemes, etc.

content.title: Select the "Health & Wellness" Category
content.description: After clicking "Services," you will see a long list of all Government services. On the left side of the screen, there is a list of Categories (like Travel, Education, Police, etc.).
content.action: Click on: → Health & Wellness (It often has a small icon like a heart or a medical cross).

content.title: Choose Your Specific Health Service
content.description: The screen will now only show the services related to healthcare. Here are the most popular ones and what to do next:

services.what_it_does: Create your digital Health ID (Ayushman Bharat Health Account).
services.action: Click ABHA → Follow the instructions to create or download your unique 14-digit ABHA number using your Aadhaar.

services.what_it_does: Get a free online doctor consultation (Telemedicine).
services.action: Click eSanjeevani → Select your state → Click Registration → Book an appointment time slot with the doctor.

services.what_it_does: Find the availability of blood in blood banks near you.
services.action: Click e-RaktKosh → Select your State and District → Choose the required Blood Group to see which blood banks have it.

services.what_it_does: Find the hospitals empanelled under the ₹5 lakh free health insurance scheme.
services.action: Click PM-JAY → Click Search Hospital → Filter by State, District, and specialty to find the nearest hospital.

services.what_it_does: Find the nearest generic medicine store (Kendra) and check medicine prices.
services.action: Click Jan Aushadhi Sugam → Use the search bar to locate the nearest store by address or check the price of a generic medicine.
